msItem.title: Shāh u Darwīsh
msItem.note: First additional blank page preceding text, recto: Note signed ACY[ate]: 'Bought at Kandahar March 1882' and a brief description. Front flyleaf, recto, in pencil: Bought at Kandahar 1881. ACY 27.4.1925. Inside front cover: Armorial bookplate of Lt-Colone Arthur Campbell Yate. A mathnawi poem. Panel of illumination over beginning of text. Headings in red on gold. Ruled and coloured margins. Leaf design in gold and pink on narrow panel separating the hemistichs.
msItem.incipit: Ay wujud-i tu asl-i har mawjud

layoutDesc.p: 13 lines to the page in two columns

bindingDesc.p: English brown half-leather binding with some tooling.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
